name: latextailor
description: Convert LaTeX multline* environments to equation environments.

commands.title: Convert LaTex: multi(align) to equation
commands.description: Convert LaTeX multline and align environments to equation environments.

commands.title: Convert LaTex: algorithm uppercase to lowercase
